nodes.text: The lair of Bokku the Hutt was the residence of the Hutt and Grand Hutt Council member Bokku. Located in the Outer Rim Territories, the lair was situated on the edge of a rocky cliff. When attempting to track down the frozen body of the smuggler Han Solo, the Sith Lord Darth Vader traveled to the lair with the Sith assassin Ochi of Bestoon in order to use Bokku's connection to Jabba the Hutt.
